sub_title: SGBV Survivors' Advocate | Mandela Washington Fellow | Communication for Development Expert | OKP Scholar
summary: I am a dedicated individual with 5 years experience in communications, advocacy and lobbying, especially around youth and women’s rights. I achieved a Division One in BA in Mass Communication and an MSC. In Development Management. Through my work and volunteering services, I have a wealth of experience in communications for development and working with victims of rape, sexual penetration, domestic violence and human trafficking. I have the desire to work with the poorest community and believes in teamwork by positively influencing others, creating acceptance and support for ideas. I am computer literate and have excellent skills in data collection, presentations, report writing and communications including social media. I am looking for a role that brings together my interests of development, communications, health and gender issues and alleviating poverty through agriculture.
